testcase.classname: Contact Customer Care for Product Inquiry
testcase.name: Contact Customer Care for Product Inquiry
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user enters valid username and password................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user clicks on contact us..............................................passed When user enters "Customer service","435837","for testing purpose" and send message.passed Then message should be sent to customer care................................passed

testcase.name: Login to site with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user enters valid username and password................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user extracts the title of the page....................................passed And page title should be same as home page..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify title of Login page
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user extracts the title of the page....................................passed Then page title should be same as login page................................passed

testcase.name: Subscribe to the newsletter
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user enters email id on news letter and submit.........................passed Then user should get successful message of subscription.....................passed

testcase.name: Place order for first product
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user enters valid username and password................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user clicks on header logo.............................................passed When user selects first product.............................................passed And user adds product to cart...............................................passed And user pays by bank wire..................................................passed Then order of selected product should be completed by bank wire.............passed

testcase.name: Place order for casual dress
testcase.system-out: Given user opens login page.................................................passed When user enters valid username and password................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user clicks on header logo.............................................passed When user selects casual dress product......................................passed And user adds product to cart...............................................passed And user pays by check......................................................passed Then order of selected product should be completed by check.................passed
